question: The theme for World Day for Safety and Health at Work 2018 is:
option1: Occupational safety health (OSH) vulnerability of young workers
option2: Safety and Health in the use of chemicals at work
option4: Join in building an OSH preventive culture
answer: Occupational safety health (OSH) vulnerability of young workers
explanation: The World Day for Safety and Health at Work was observed all over the world on 28th April to promote safe, healthy and decent work. It has been observed by the International Labour Organization (ILO) since 2003. The theme for World Day for Safety and Health at Work 2018 is: Occupational safety health (OSH) vulnerability of young workers.
